results.title: Mysterious Object Emerges on a Florida Beach, Setting Off Speculation
results.abstract: Archaeologists expect to examine the object, which appears to be about 80 feet long and made of wood and metal, during low tide on Monday.

media.caption: Some theories about what is jutting out from the sand at Daytona Beach Shores are that it is a barrier, a shipwreck, a portion of an old pier, or spectator seating from when NASCAR had races on the beach.

results.title: Popular Pastor Returns After Absence Over an ‘Inappropriate’ Online Relationship
results.abstract: Matt Chandler of the Village Church in suburban Dallas received a standing ovation after his leave, part of a period of turmoil among evangelical churches.

results.byline: By John Koblin and Michael M. Grynbaum
results.title: ABC News Pulls Daytime Co-Anchors After Revelations of a Romance
results.abstract: T.J. Holmes and Amy Robach, who co-host “GMA3,” are temporarily off the air after a spate of tabloid reports.

media.caption: ABC News announced to staff members on Monday that the anchors T.J. Holmes, left, and Amy Robach had been pulled from the network’s daytime talk show, “GMA3.”

results.abstract: A Colorado graphic designer says she has a First Amendment right to refuse to create websites for same-sex weddings despite a state anti-discrimination law.

results.title: When High Fashion and QAnon Collide

results.title: War and Sanctions Threaten to Thrust Russia’s Economy Back in Time

results.title: Iran Has Abolished Morality Police, an Official Suggests, After Months of Protests

results.title: TikTok Influencer Is Fined After Hitting a Golf Ball Into the Grand Canyon
results.abstract: Katie Sigmond, who has nearly seven million followers on TikTok and posts workout and modeling videos, faced legal trouble after the stunt.
